title: If You Strip The Bondage, '50 Shades' Is A Conventional Love Story
teaser: The film, based on E.L. James' best-selling novel, has been denounced by decency brigades. But it's a surprisingly mild, corny romance that affirms traditional values: It's Jane Eyre with ropes.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
